header.title: POINT5 Podcast
header.subtitle: Your space to be heard. Schedule a session and join the conversation.

welcome.heading: Welcome!
welcome.text: Thanks for checking out the official POINT5 Podcast website! This website was made to support the needs of my guests. I didn't include something you need?: please, let me know!

communities.heading: Use Our Communities for Everything!
communities.text: Everything you need can be found in our community spaces. These are the best places to join before we record. They're a great way to collaborate, schedule, and keep in touch. The best outcome would be for you to appear again to give the podcast an update. If you want to get on podcast with one of the other guests, this is the space to get that opportunity setup.!

guidance.heading: What to Expect
guidance.text: After submitting your information in the form, I'll contact you by email. Our recordings are relaxed and conversational — you don’t need to worry about anything formal. Bring your ideas, stories, or topics, and we’ll guide the conversation with care. This is an addition to test the github text storage feature. This is another addition.

host.heading: Meet the Host
host.bio: Hi, I’m Kevin Nordio! I host POINT5 Podcast. I started the podcast to provide a space for people to be heard. If you're looking for the opportunity to showcase yourself to the world, I'd love to have you on the podcast. There's no better way to create your story than to share it with a public audience. I hope that you choose my podcast to share your stories.
